com.nasdaq.ncdsclient.core

Interface KafkaProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KafkaCluster
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KafkaTestCluster, KafkaTestServer

    public interface KafkaProvider
    Provides a slimmed down view onto KafkaCluster to avoid circular references in code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KafkaBrokers getKafkaBrokers()
      Returns an immutable list of broker hosts for the kafka cluster.
      java.lang.String getKafkaConnectString()
      bootstrap.servers string to configure Kafka consumers or producers to access the Kafka cluster.
      java.util.List<ListenerProperties> getListenerProperties()
      Connection details about each of the registered listeners on the kafka broker.
      java.lang.String getZookeeperConnectString()
      Returns connection string for zookeeper clients.

    • Method Detail

      • getKafkaBrokers

        KafkaBrokers getKafkaBrokers()
        Returns an immutable list of broker hosts for the kafka cluster.
        Returns:
        immutable list of hosts for brokers within the cluster.

      • getKafkaConnectString

        java.lang.String getKafkaConnectString()
        bootstrap.servers string to configure Kafka consumers or producers to access the Kafka cluster.
        Returns:
        Connect string to use for Kafka clients.

      • getListenerProperties

        java.util.List<ListenerProperties> getListenerProperties()
        Connection details about each of the registered listeners on the kafka broker.
        Returns:
        details about each of the registered listeners on the kafka broker.

      • getZookeeperConnectString

        java.lang.String getZookeeperConnectString()
        Returns connection string for zookeeper clients.
        Returns:
        Connection string to connect to the Zookeeper instance.
